TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpSessionStateContainer extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState

summary.span: 包含目前要求的工作階段狀態值，以及工作階段層級設定。

span.span: Contains session-state values as well as session-level settings for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了工作階段狀態管理，可讓您儲存在多個要求相關聯的唯一瀏覽器工作階段的資訊。ASP.NET provides session-state management to enable you to store information associated with a unique browser session across multiple requests. 您可以儲存參考索引鍵的名稱或數值索引值的集合。You can store a collection of values referenced by a key name or by numerical index. 存取工作階段值和功能是提供使用類別，可透過存取屬性的目前或屬性。Access to session values and functionality is available using the class, which is accessible through the property of the current or the property of the . 類別存取工作階段狀態值和工作階段層級設定所參考的工作階段狀態容器，這是實作填入工作階段狀態資料並加入至介面目前要求的工作階段狀態模組。The class accesses session-state values and session-level settings by referencing a session-state container, which is an implementation of the interface that has been populated with session-state data and added to the of the current request by the session-state module for the . 類別會呼叫類別，管理工作階段設定和記憶體中的值。The class calls the class, which manages session settings and values in memory. 類別是 ASP.NET 實作介面。The class is the ASP.NET implementation of the interface. 類別不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。The class is not intended to be called from application code. 如果您取代自訂的工作階段狀態模組，您可以使用類別，或提供您自己實作介面。If you replace the with a custom session-state module, you can use the class, or supply your own implementation of the interface. ## Examples 如需自訂的工作階段狀態模組使用的範例類別做為目前要求的工作階段狀態容器，請參閱類別概觀。For an example of a custom session-state module that uses the class as the session-state container for the current request, see the class overview.

summary.span: 建立新的 物件，並使用指定的設定和值加以初始化。

span.span: Creates a new object and initializes it with the specified settings and values.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範事件處理常式會填入新的自訂工作階段狀態模組與新的或現有的工作階段資訊的物件，並將它加入至目前的要求使用方法。The following code example shows the event handler for a custom session-state module that populates a new object with new or existing session information and adds it to the of the current request using the method. 自訂工作階段狀態模組的完整程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀。For a full code example of a custom session-state module, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#4)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abandon() cil managed

summary.span: 將目前的工作階段標記為已放棄。

span.span: Marks the current session as abandoned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法標記屬性做為`true`。The method of the marks the property as `true`. 然後可查詢的自訂工作階段的模組屬性，並移除工作階段資訊，若屬性是`true`。A custom session module can then query the property and remove the session information if the property is `true`.

span.span: Adds a new item to the session-state collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`參數參考現有的工作階段狀態項目時，現有的項目會覆寫具有指定`value`。If the `name` parameter refers to an existing session-state item, the existing item is overwritten with the specified `value`.

span.span: Removes all values and keys from the session-state collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CodePage { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前工作階段的字集識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the character-set identifier for the current session.

value.span: 目前工作階段的字元集識別項。

span.span: The character-set identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字元集 （字碼頁） 用來解譯多位元組字元資料，判斷字元值，並排序次序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multibyte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 字碼頁設定僅適用於多位元組字元資料，而無法 Unicode 字元資料。Code-page settings apply only to multibyte character data, not to Unicode character data. 這提供屬性為了與 ASP 的舊版本只有相容性。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果您不需要維護回溯相容性的 ASP 頁面，使用屬性改為。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead.

span.span: One of the values that indicates whether the application is configured for cookieless sessions.
The default is .

span.span: Always , because thread-safe objects are not supported.

summary.span: 取得或設定目前工作階段的地區設定識別項 (LCID)。

span.span: Gets or sets the locale identifier (LCID) of the current session.

value.span: 執行個體，指定目前工作階段的文化特性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供屬性為了與 ASP 的舊版本只有相容性。The property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果您不需要維護回溯相容性的 ASP 頁面，使用屬性改為。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead. ASP.NET 不會在工作階段狀態儲存的地區設定識別碼。ASP.NET does not store the locale identifier in session state. 屬性存取屬性以取得設定的識別碼。The property accesses the property to get and set the identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何設定伺服器供或工作階段狀態儲存模式，請參閱[ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For information about how to configure your server for or session-state storage mode, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果頁面上的物件不支援序列化和是跨處理序 (或)，將不會建立物件，並將不會加入至這個集合。If an object on a page does not support serialization and is out-of-process ( or ), the object will not be created and will not be added to this collection. 是提供來與 ASP 先前版本相容。 is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.

The maximum allowed is 525,600 (one year).
